name: Tun Keltesch
title: Software Engineer
description: I build robust, efficient, and scalable software solutions, specializing in machine learning and embedded systems.
about: In 2020, I started my journey in software engineering, diving deep into the world of coding and web development. Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working on diverse projects, from customer technical support to implementing operating systems for embedded devices.

My main focus these days is building accessible and efficient software solutions, with a particular interest in machine learning and embedded systems. I enjoy tackling complex problems and creating innovative solutions that bridge the gap between theoretical concepts and practical applications.
When I'm not at the computer, I'm usually exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or expanding my knowledge in computer science and mathematics.

experience.jobTitle: Software Engineer · Agile Data Innovation GmbH
experience.description: Working on a Project for Fraunhofer-Gesellschaft. Developed software solutions for innovative data projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality results.

experience.jobTitle: Internship (System programming lab) · Chair of Embedded Software (RWTH)
experience.description: Implemented an OS for an ATmega 644 using C. Gained hands-on experience in low-level programming and embedded systems development.
Contributed to software development projects as a working student, applying theoretical knowledge to real-world problems and gaining practical experience in a professional environment.

education.description: Advanced level in Economics and Mathematics
